text: When issuing orders, you can issue orders at range 4.
While you are defending, each friendly corps trooper unit at range 1 gains "Guardian 1".
After an order token is drawn from a friendly order pool, draw a second order token from that order pool; choose 1 to use and shuffle the other back into its order pool.
If you do, during the End Phase, ready this card.
When a friendly trooper unit with a faceup order token activates, during its Rally step, it may remove 1 suppression token instead of rolling dice.
